name: Memeloviracidade
description:
One player take the Virus role, trying to fetch and drag around delicious private files. The other one is the Antivirus, trying to keep his user computer safe. Hop on this split-screen mayhem and destroy your friendships!

Playing as Virus
  • Fetching files will grant you a tail. Bigger tails means more dragging;
  • Beware the AV Shield, it will push you away. Try using your tail in order to knock stuff out the quarintine area;
  • Your tail works as weapon, smack the AV in the face!
Playing as AV
  • Your shield has a cooldown, use it sparingly;
  • Placing a new shield will overwrite the previous one;
  • Place as many files as possibile inside the quarintine area and keep the virus at bay;
  • A direct headbutt on the virus will make it drop part of his tail. You mess with the bull you get the horns!
Controls
  • Analog to move
  • X Button for Shield (AV only)
